bibl.title: POxy 2509 and Callimachus' Lavacrum Palladis: αἰγιόχοιο Διὸς κούρη μεγάλοιο.
bibl.note: If P. Oxy. XXX, 2509 does belong in the Hesiodic Catalogue of Women, there are several points that bear on our understanding of the fifth Hymn. - I. 'Callimachus Hesiodicus'. - II. The 'Mimetic' Description (lines 1-32). - III. Athena and Chariclo: καταθύμιοι ἑταῖραι.
bibl.seg: DEPEW Mary, POxy 2509 and Callimachus' Lavacrum Palladis: αἰγιόχοιο Διὸς κούρη μεγάλοιο.

If P. Oxy. XXX, 2509 does belong in the Hesiodic Catalogue of Women, there are several points that bear on our understanding of the fifth Hymn. - I. 'Callimachus Hesiodicus'. - II. The 'Mimetic' Description (lines 1-32). - III. Athena and Chariclo: καταθύμιοι ἑταῖραι.
